characterTypes.name: Human
characterTypes.description: Cannot be Downed or Robbed with bludgeon when has a helmet. Downed by Hazards.

characterTypes.name: Robot
characterTypes.description: Not affected by Hazards. Helmet does not protect from downing/robbing by Bludgeon.

characterTypes.name: Item
characterTypes.description: Can be Picked Up, Dropped, Thrown etc.
